item.title: [Shard] Deposit Box [Bank]
item.dc:creator: @I_Ashley_I I Ashley I
item.description:
@I_Ashley_I wrote:

[Shard] Deposit Box [Bank].

Purpose: To add working deposit banking boxes.
difficulty: 1.

Step 1.
Open AtObject class and add this

case 9398://deposit box client.getActionAssistant().sendFrame126("The Bank of CreativeScape - Deposit Box", 7421); client.getActionAssistant().sendFrame248(4465, 197); client.getActionAssistant().resetItems(7423); break;

Step 2.
Open RemoveItem class and add this

} else if (interfaceID == 7423) { client.getContainerAssistant().bankItem(removeID, removeSlot, 1); client.getActionAssistant().resetItems(7423);

Step 3.
Open Bank5 packet, add this

} else if (interfaceID == 32668) { client.getContainerAssistant().bankItem(removeID, removeSlot, 5); client.getActionAssistant().resetItems(7423);

Step 3.
Open Bank5 packet, add this

} else if (interfaceID == 32668) { client.getContainerAssistant().bankItem(removeID, removeSlot, 5); client.getActionAssistant().resetItems(7423);

Step 4.
Open Bank10, add this

} else if (interfaceID == 65436) { client.getContainerAssistant().bankItem(removeID, removeSlot, 10); client.getActionAssistant().resetItems(7423);

Step 5.
Open BankX, add this

} else if(client.getBankXinterfaceID() == 7423) { client.getContainerAssistant().bankItem( client.playerItems[client.getBankXremoveSlot()], client.getBankXremoveSlot(), bankXamount); client.getActionAssistant().resetItems(7423);

Step 6.
Open BankAll, add this

} else if (interfaceID == 7295) { if (Item.itemStackable[removeID]) { client.getContainerAssistant().bankItem(client.playerItems[removeSlot], removeSlot,client.playerItemsN[removeSlot]); client.getActionAssistant().resetItems(7423); } else { client.getContainerAssistant().bankItem(client.playerItems[removeSlot],removeSlot,client.getActionAssistant().getItemAmount(client.playerItems[removeSlot] - 1)); client.getActionAssistant().resetItems(7423); }

Credits - 100% I Ashley I (Me).

Read full topic
